message.body: Gd it, Greys and the crying!!!!!
Sad to say I haven't watched it in forever! What's the new drama?
Oh god, so much as usual. Death, dying, and bereavement.
Of course. Remember when you found me sobbing over Greys right before graduation?
Too well. And then you played two seconds of it and I started weeping!
Haha we were a mess. Do you ever miss our lost extravaganza?
ALL THE TIME. Also thinking about that. And snackz. And hearing noises from 'that guy' in your room
Like the random guitar playing.... I wish we could go back to our lost days! I miss you like crazy.
Oh my god yes! No wonder we were a wreck, they were taking away heaven!
Totally. Our own little happy place- lost, nutella and a pretty fantastic friendship :)
Ughhhhhhh TEARS did I mention there were babies in greys. Nostalgia will throw me over the edge!
Omg babies. Did I tell you that this summer I'm in clinical with babies and kids AND in labor and delivery!
HOW WILL YOU DO IT?????? I'd die all the time
I suppose that be part of it. But hopefully it'll be weighed out by the good.
Im just hoping its not super sad all the time but it might be. Do you have plans for presidents day wknd?
I don't think I have plans, but I'm fucking really broke. But you should come here!!!! And do nothing with me!
That would be super fun! Have you been to dc before though?
In middle school... Which doesn't count. I really really want to come I just need to come into some money first.
I can help you get down here (hey tax return!) because I'd really love to come up but I'll probably have to do a little homework that weekend and itd be annoying to carry my books all the way up.
Oh my my my, that's super generous of you. Let's talk about specifics and such. Do you have the specific dates of that weekend?
Feb 18,19 and 20th. Do you have the Monday off (the 20th)?
Nope... Doesn't look like it based on my school google calendar, but that could be wrong. I'm counting on getting this job so that might be a factor too. But FUCK I want to make it happen!
Me too! Its been so long since I've seen you. Well we can play it by ear until it gets close :)
No worries! Life is hectic right now- I totally understand.
I wish I could answer on the affirmative right now! But yes, by ear. Boooo life.
